overview:
Aaron Saltzman is a founding member of Slingr, Inc., and currently serves as its Vice President of Strategy. He manages marketing, new client acquisition, strategic partnerships, and long-term business development for the location-based social gifting start-up.

A native of Los Angeles, Saltzman has a background in strategic development and marketing communications. In his early twenties, Saltzman worked as a political operative and consultant for candidate campaigns and advocacy non-profits. After working on projects in multiple states on both the east and west coasts, Saltzman returned to LA, reuniting with old friendsâ€”including fellow Slingr founders Justin Malvin, Fernando Vasquez, Chase DeLuca, and Paul Villanueva. While in LA, Saltzman aggressively developed web marketing campaigns for senior advocacy, healthcare, philanthropic, and education non-profits.

Saltzman has a BA in International Relations from the University of California, Davis. An avid fitness junkie, he enjoys trail running, swimming, kickboxing, and nearly any activity involving Southern California’s beaches.
